department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Canada is seeking offers to provide one Four-Row Corn Planter. Four-Row Corn Planter must be in new condition to Department of Agriculture and Food.
description: Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide one(1) Four-Row Corn Planter. The Four-Row Corn Planter must be of new condition to Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).
full_summary:
### 4-Row Corn Planter Tender Notice

#### Procurement Information

- **Reference Number** | WS4412618660-Doc4445668951
- **Solicitation Number** | WS4412618660
- **Publication Date**, **Tender Closing Date**, and **Amendment Date** | [as above]
- **Procurement Category** | Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**| Competitive, Open Tenders

#### Description of Goods/Services

Canada requires the provision of a 4-row corn planter from an eligible supplier. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering one (1) machine of new condition to the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).

Acceptable suppliers will be determined through a price-based evaluation of offers received.

#### End-User Information

- **End-User Entity** | Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
- **End-User Address** | K.W. Neatby Building, 960 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario, K1Y4X2, Canada

#### Contact Information for the Contracting Authority

- **Name** | Justin O'Neil
- **Email** | [justin.oneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:justin.oneil@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
- **Phone** | (Not provided)

#### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18805554?extsite=MTg4MDU1NTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Specifications and Requisites

Note that the supplied documentation includes specific requirements for the subject tender. Interested parties are advised to review the bidding documents and solicitation carefully before participating.

**With respect to any personal data provided, it shall be understood that, where necessary, public bodies, their agents and/or contractors, as recognized by the requirements of their respective jurisdiction, will access the data, as related to the activities of the public body in question.**

This is a Forced Redaction with all read-access information redacted. It was edited for clarity and readability purposes.
